mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_NO noticeNo ,NOTICE_TITLE noticeTitle ,NOTICE_CONTENTS noticeContents ,NOTICE_WRITER noticeWriter ,NOTICE_EDITER noticeEditer ,NOTICE_CREATE noticeCreate ,NOTICE_MODIFY noticeModify FROM MYBATIS_NOTICE

SELECT NOTICE_NO ,NOTICE_TITLE ,NOTICE_CONTENTS ,NOTICE_WRITER ,NOTICE_EDITER ,NOTICE_CREATE ,NOTICE_MODIFY FROM MYBATIS_NOTICE WHERE 1=1
OR NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo}
OR NOTICE_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{noticeTitle}||'%'
OR NOTICE_CONTENTS = '%'||#{noticeContents}||'%'
OR NOTICE_WRITER = '%'||#{noticeWriter}||'%'
OR NOTICE_EDITER = '%'||#{noticeEditer}||'%'
OR NOTICE_CREATE = '%'||#{noticeCreate}||'%'
OR NOTICE_MODIFY IS NULL
OR NOTICE_MODIFY = #{noticeModify}

SELECT NOTICE_NO noticeNo ,NOTICE_TITLE noticeTitle ,NOTICE_CONTENTS noticeContents ,NOTICE_WRITER noticeWriter ,NOTICE_EDITER noticeEditer ,NOTICE_CREATE noticeCreate ,NOTICE_MODIFY noticeModify FROM MYBATIS_NOTICE WHERE 1=1 AND NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo}
